test_output_summary: 13 tests passed, 0 failed. All acceptance criteria verified through comprehensive test coverage including: list features, list adrs, list patterns, list constraints, list all categories, empty category handling, disabled Graphiti handling, connection error handling, search error handling, malformed JSON handling, item count display, and invalid category handling.
implementation_notes:
Implemented the `guardkit graphiti list` command following the specification from FEAT-GR-005. The command allows users to list knowledge in specific categories (features, adrs, patterns, constraints) or all categories at once. Implementation includes:

1. Added `_cmd_list()` async function that handles category-to-group mapping and connection management
2. Added `_list_single_category()` helper function that searches and formats results for a single category
3. Added `list_knowledge()` Click command with category choice parameter
4. Implemented intelligent JSON parsing with fallback to plain text display
5. Added proper error handling for disabled Graphiti, connection errors, and search errors
6. Created comprehensive test suite with 13 test cases covering all acceptance criteria

The implementation follows existing patterns in the codebase (similar to show and search commands) and integrates seamlessly with the GraphitiClient API.
